EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Versatility I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans can select racial boosts that share a number of uses per rest, but are not linked with class action boost cooldowns.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active to gain a +6 Action Boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10 Action Boost to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Melee and Ranged Power
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all Saving Throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail Saving Throws on a roll of a Natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Adaptability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to an ability score of your choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Versatility II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans can select racial boosts that share a number of uses per rest, but are not linked with class action boost cooldowns. Note: Choose another Action Boost that is not the same as the previous one.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active ato gain a +6 Action Boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10 Action Boost to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Melee and Ranged Power
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all Saving Throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail Saving Throws on a roll of a Natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Greater Adaptability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to another ability score of your choice. (You may not select the same ability score as Human Adaptability.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Versatility III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans can select racial boosts that share a number of uses per rest, but are not linked with class action boost cooldowns. Note: Choose another Action Boost that is not the same as either of the previous two.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active ato gain a +6 Action Boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Defense Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10 Action Boost to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Melee and Ranged Power
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Saves Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all Saving Throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail Saving Throws on a roll of a Natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4 Action Boost to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants additional uses of dragonmarks and a bonus to the associated skill.

RequiresOneOf.DisplayDescription: Least Dragonmark of Finding, Making, Passage or Sentinel

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tharashk Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day +[1/2/3] Search.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cannith Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day +[1/2/3] Repair.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Orien Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day +[1/2/3] Balance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Deneith Dragonmark Focus
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] dragonmark use per day +[1/2/3] Intimidate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Skill Focus I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans are versatile and can excel at virtually any skill

EnhancementSelection.Name: Athletic
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, Swim, and Tumble.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Awareness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Focused
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Intimidate.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Negotiator
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Perform.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nimble Fingers
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Disable Device and Open Lock.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Self Sufficient
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal and Repair.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stealthy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Action Surge I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boosts also increase an ability score of your choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Dexterity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Intelligence.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Improved Recovery I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Don't Count Me Out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your range of unconsciousness extends by [5/10/20] hitpoints, and you gain a +[3/6/10] bonus to Physical Resistance Rating while you are under 50% health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Lesser Dragonmarks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans have access to the Dragonmarks of Finding, Making, Passage and Sentinel. Also allows you to use your Least Dragonmark an extra time per rest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Knock
EnhancementSelection.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Knock (Skill = Character Level + Charisma Modifier)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Repair Serious Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Repair Serious Damage Also grants +3 to all Crafting skills.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Dimension Door
EnhancementSelection.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Dimension Door.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Protection from Elements
EnhancementSelection.Description: Lesser Dragonmark Spell: Protection from Elements

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans are versatile and can excel at virtually any skill

EnhancementSelection.Name: Athletic
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, Swim, and Tumble.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Awareness
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Focused
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Intimidate.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Negotiator
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Perform.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nimble Fingers
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Disable Device and Open Lock.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Self Sufficient
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal and Repair.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stealthy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move Silently.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Action Surge II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boosts also increase an ability score of your choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Dexterity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Intelligence.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Fighting Style
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans are adept at many different fighting styles.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ambidexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +1 to hit when dual-wielding or fighting unarmed. Rank 2: Also gains +1% Dodge. Rank 3: Also gains +1 damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Great Weapon Aptitude
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shield Mastery
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15]% Shield Armor Class and +[1/2/3] Tower Shield Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sniper
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +[1/2/3]d6 Ranged Sneak Attack. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by [2/4/6] meters.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Traditional caster
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power when wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Greater Dragonmarks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Humans have access to the Dragonmarks of Finding, Making, Passage and Sentinel. Also allows you to use your Least and Lesser Marks an extra time per rest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Treasure Finding
EnhancementSelection.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Treasure Finding

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Reconstruct
EnhancementSelection.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Reconstruct Also grants +4 to all Crafting skills

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Teleport
EnhancementSelection.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Teleport.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Globe of Invulnerability
EnhancementSelection.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Globe of Invulnerability

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Skill Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to all skills.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Action Surge III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boosts also increase an ability score of your choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Dexterity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Improved Recovery II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Heroism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Cast the Heroism spell. Effects that grant extra Action Boost uses give you additional uses per rest of this ability

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Action Surge IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boosts also increase an ability score of your choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Dexterity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Intelligence.

EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: While under the effect of any Action Boost, you gain a +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Improved Recovery III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Human: Greater Heroism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Greater Heroism. This ability shares a common pool of uses per rest with the Heroism ability. Effects that grant extra Action Boost uses give you additional uses per rest of this ability.
